channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: HBO Still Loyal to ‘House of the Dragon’ Despite Creative Strife
item.description: Behind the scenes turmoil isn't stopping the network's excitement for the return of 'House of the Dragon' later in 2026.

item.title: ChatGPT or Super Bowl? OpenAI premium ads could cost as much as a prime NFL TV slot - but which is better value?
item.description: OpenAI is launching ChatGPT ads with NFL-level pricing, offering impression data only, raising questions about engagement and advertising value.

item.title: Trump’s Pick for Fed Chair Points to Growing Bitcoin-Dollar Synthesis
item.description: Warsh's hawkish stance on Fed policy may have disappointed the crypto world, but he said Bitcoin was effectively gold for anyone under the age of 40.

item.title: NVIDIA is still planning to make a 'huge' investment in OpenAI, CEO says
item.description: NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang told reporters that the company will "invest a great deal of money" in OpenAI's latest funding round, according to Bloomberg, after The Wall Street Journal on Friday reported that the two companies were rethinking a previous $100 billion deal that hasn't "progressed beyond the early stages" of negotiations. Speaking to reporters in Taipei this weekend, Huang reportedly said it could be "the largest investment we've ever made." NVIDIA and OpenAI jointly announced in September that NVIDIA would be investing up to $100 billion in OpenAI to build 10 gigawatts of AI data cen...

item.title: Ayaneo's Pocket S Mini has the perfect aspect ratio for revisiting classic console games
item.description: There may be plenty of gaming handhelds out there, but there aren't many horizontal options that let you play childhood favorites in the original 4:3 aspect ratio. To address that gap, Ayaneo launched a premium option with the Pocket S Mini. As a "true 4:3 retro handheld," the Pocket S Mini won't have those pesky vertical black bars whenever you're emulating video games from the CRT television era. Handhelds like the Anbernic RG405M and even Ayaneo's own Pocket Air Mini already offer a 4:3 aspect ratio, but the Pocket S Mini presents a more high-end build with a full metal frame and a glass fr...

item.title: “No more Minnesota nice, Minneapolis will strike”
item.description: It was too cold to take off my mittens and check Google Maps so I put my faith in the trickle of bundled-up people ahead of me. All of them were carrying signs and wearing whistles around their necks on top of layers and layers of winter clothing. At first there were dozens of us […]

item.title: Lock in on your 2026 health goals with this Etekcity smart scale (and it’s on sale)
item.description: This Etekcity Smart Scale is under $20 this weekend on Amazon

item.title: Study: Used EVs Are The Cheapest Vehicles To Own
item.description: A lot of people leased EVs three years ago, and now they're turning them in. You should probably buy one.

item.title: This discount on this 75-inch TCL UHD Smart TV is almost as big the TV itself
item.description: Save $170 on this TCL 75-inch UHD Smart TV on Amazon this weekend

item.title: Onnit's Instant Melatonin Spray Keeps Bedtime Uncomplicated
item.description: Just spritz and sleep—no melatonin tablets or pills necessary.

item.title: HBO Knows ‘It: Welcome to Derry’ Should Get a Season 2
item.description: If you're wanting more 'Welcome to Derry,' you better hope the Muschiettis come up with a good enough reason to take you back to town.

item.title: Don’t You Dare ‘Misinterpret’ Elon Musk’s Epstein Emails. Just the Facts Are Bad Enough
item.description: Sorry, but what is the correct interpretation supposed to be?

item.title: SpaceX wants to put 1 million solar-powered data centers into orbit
item.description: SpaceX filed a request with the FCC on Friday seeking approval to put a constellation of 1 million data center satellites into orbit. While the FCC is unlikely to approve a network that expansive, SpaceX's strategy has been to request approval for unrealistically large numbers of satellites as a starting point for negotiations. The filing […]

item.title: No, it’s not the latest games console - AtomMan G7 Pro mini PC from Minisforum goes on sale with a Core i9-14900HX and RTX 5070 in a super slim chassis, but you might be better off buying a Dell
item.description: Minisforum AtomMan G7 Pro delivers Core i9-14900HX performance in a super slim mini PC design.

item.title: Microsoft has finally fixed a bizarre issue that saw it reroute traffic to an obscure Japanese company - so what exactly went wrong?
item.description: Microsoft’s email autoconfiguration routed example.com traffic to Japanese servers, exposing long-standing gaps in oversight and configuration control.
